name: rune
description: Multi-agent engineering orchestration for Claude Code. Plan, work, review, inspect, test, and audit with Agent Teams. Includes 38 review agents, 5 research agents, 23 investigation agents, 11 utility agents, 2 work agents, 4 testing agents, 14 commands, and 34 skills. Curated elicitation methods for structured reasoning. Stack-aware intelligence with 12 language/framework/pattern specialist reviewers. Multi-language quality guidance (Python, TypeScript, Rust, PHP, Axum).
